dynGuiComponents.text: There are no items in this list.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Customize the appearance of the navigation drawer.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Always expand the notification to show playback buttons.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Keep notification and lockscreen controls when playback is paused.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Change the playback buttons on the lockscreen. The play/pause button is always included.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Set the lockscreen background to the current episode's image. As a side effect, this will also show the image in third party apps.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: If downloads fail, generate a report that shows the details of the failure.
